super

Fue el episodio más divertido, estuve entretenido en todo momento con los puzzles y cosas originales que añade, pero el final... vaya forma de terminar, ojalá no hubieran cancelado la tercera entrega u.u 
Personalmente, de alguna forma siento como que el final logró dejarme satisfecho, en otros juegos, a veces incluso con el Good Ending, pienso en las posibilidades y aventuras que le seguirán a los personajes y se siente ese vacío que muchos sentimos al terminar un juego que amamos, pero con HL2 Ep. 2 no me pasó nya

G胖在这一作的开头的评论音轨里说，这是半条命三部曲的第二部的第二个章节，然后就没有3了。最后真的出乎意料，让人无法接话茬。比半条命2原作还要好，虽然在长度上是小巫见大巫。画面提升到这个份儿上是相当有诚意的了，再加上开放式的关卡设计，相较于幽闭型的第一章焕然一新。结尾的森林大战是全篇高潮，画下了完美的句号。

Half-Life je prostě srdcovka. Miluji ten příběh.

Příběh je sice obrovský cliffhanger, ale to už je prostě Valve. Half-Life: Alyx si snad zahraji za padesát let, až budu mít nejdříve na počítač a pak až na VR příslušenství. (smích) Ne, fakt se jednou těším, až si to zahraji. Half-Life mi na svoji dobu, kdy byl vytvořen, připomíná až moc reálný svět, či svět okolo nás. Postavy tam působí skutečně reálně, že k nim po čase začnete něco cítit, ať už je to láska nebo nenávist. Odmala žiji v paneláku, sice ne na velikém sídlišti, ale až když jsem se přestěhovala na místo, kde je sídliště dvakrát, třikrát takové, tak tu hru vidím i tam. Joo, Half-Life je prostě Half-Life. DOPORUČUJI 10/10.

Gets going gradually, however, increase to an epic end. This episode includes some stunning new ongoing interaction, an insane decent OST with something else entirely, and top-level discourse and story.

What's more, I positively see the reason why individuals are extremely disappointed that Valve never made Episode 3! ;)

This game picks up directly after the events of Half-Life 2: Episode 1. You have to deliver a crucial data packet to an old missile base, known as White Forest, while getting through challenging obstacles. This game also introduces a few new enemies, and it offers several hours of action-packed gameplay. Overall, this game is an excellent episode for Half-Life 2.

Not as strong as the core game, but still fairly solid all things considered. A shame there's not yet a conclusive ending for this series of games. I'd buy Episode 3 even if it was a full price release and on this same engine at this point, despite the fact I only finished the series this year (2022). They sucked me in so well. If Titan Quest, Kingdoms of Amalur and Postal 2 can launch late DLC, I don't see why this couldn't... Other than their lack of fingers, but at this point it just feels like Valve are either intentionally meme-ing, or really don't want to risk brand dilution... Which is respectable, but I really hate that this has been left this way. A great, but inconclusive ending to the HL2 Series.

шикарная игра. вот это уже, в отличии от первого эпизоде, можно назвать полноценной игрой. довольно интересный сюжет, но самое крутое - это финальная битва. как же у меня захватывало дух, было эпично и немного страшно, невероятно круто. концовка хоть и намекает на несуществующее продолжение, все равно довольно понятна и очень неплоха. но вот достижения... ненавижу этого гнома. ненавижу.

плюсы:
+ интересный сюжет и концовка;
+ финальная битва это что-то с чем-то.

минусы:
- если кто будет выполнять все достижения, я вам сочувствую... этот ебаный Чомски убил мои последние нервные окончания.

good expansion. miss days where expansions were actually good (blue shift is an exception, yes it is *probably* good but cmon man launch day and you charge a ton of bucks for a few hours of gameplay? not cool.)

Episode 2 follows from Episode 1 (unsurprisingly), still with an unresolved plot.
Mostly the same gameplay mechanics as Episode 1 and HL2. You play as Gordon Freeman. You shoot at things. You solve puzzles. Alyx Vance encourages you. But this time, a good proportion of Episode 2 consists of you driving a muscle car (which is used about as much, maybe less, as the time you use a vehicle in HL2, but proportionally more significant), starting about midway though the game to reach the Resistance base and until the end of the Episode to protect the base in a tower-defense game style. So I suppose that's integral to this Episode and adds to the same ol' run-and-gun feel of its predecessors.

Another key difference is the setting; you are no longer in City 17 and now out in White Forest.
There's a wholly different atmosphere in this game, which in a way makes it feel distinct from HL2 and Episode 1.

It is fairly short, but enjoyable. Though I very much feel that this game should be bought in conjunction with Episode 1 for a "lengthier" experience.

Get it if you loved HL2 and/or Episode 1. While we wait for the plot* to continue, let it be known that the Half-Life series is truly magnificent. Great job to the writers, voice actors, programmers, testers, and all the rest at Valve for this awesome franchise.

*[spoiler]The ending of HL: Alyx[/spoiler] [spoiler]altered the game's ending, btw. I think.[/spoiler]
